description: Do you want to connect your Android App to all those fancy services like Twitter, Facebook or even DropBox? All of them rely on OAuth for authentication and this tutorial gives you a brief walkthrough on how to archive your goal.
title: http://simpleprogrammer.com/2011/05/25/oauth-and-rest-in-android-part-1/

description: In the Android component library there is no native support for Drag and Drop. But it's not that difficult to implement it by yourself.

description: Twitters pull to refresh is a well adopted gesture in many apps. Here is a reusable component that implements this behaviour.
